    Reads in a Turtle - Terse RDF Triple Language (TTL) formatted ontology file: Turtle - Terse RDF Triple Language: https://www.w3.org/TeamSubmission/turtle/ The extra lines make sure that the files are found if run under Eclipse IDE or as a runnable Java Archive file (JAR).

  • Method Details

    • writeModel

      public static void writeModel​(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model m, java.lang.String target_file, com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus)
      This method is used to write the Turtle formatted output files that are the result of of the conversion process. An utility method to export an Apache Jena RDF storage content into a Turtle formatted file- Supports UTF.
      Parameters:
      m - an Apache Jena model
      target_file - absolute path name for an output file
      eventBus - A queue to communicate between program component. Here: status messages and errors are sent to user interface If no user interface is present, adding messages to the channel does nothing.

    • writeModelRDFStream

      public static void writeModelRDFStream​(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model m, java.lang.String target_file, com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus)

    • writeDataset

      public static void writeDataset​(org.apache.jena.query.Dataset ds, java.lang.String target_file, com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus)

    • readInOntologyTTL

      public static void readInOntologyTTL​(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model model, java.lang.String ontology_file, com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus)
      Reads in a Turtle - Terse RDF Triple Language (TTL) formatted ontology file: Turtle - Terse RDF Triple Language: https://www.w3.org/TeamSubmission/turtle/ The extra lines make sure that the files are found if run under Eclipse IDE or as a runnable Java Archive file (JAR). Eclipse: https://www.eclipse.org/
      Parameters:
      model - An Apache Jena model: RDF store run on memory.
      ontology_file - An Apache Jena ontokigy model: RDF store run on memory containing an ontology engine.
      eventBus - A queue to communicate between program component. Here: status messages and errors are sent to user interface If no user interface is present, adding messages to the channel does nothing.

    • copyTriples

      public static void copyTriples​(int level, org.apache.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode r, org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model output_model)
      An utility method to copy of conected Abox triples unmodified from one Jena model to another. This is used to copy ifcOWL property set data as is.
      Parameters:
      level - how many steps from the start node
      r - A RDF node to start the copying
      output_model - A Jena model where the triples are copied to

    • pathQuery

      public static java.util.List<org.apache.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode> pathQuery​(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource r, RDFStep[] path)
      A helper method to find a list of nodes that match a given RDF path pattern
      Parameters:
      r - the starting point
      path - the path pattern
      Returns:
      the list of found noded at the RDF graoh

    • getType

      public static java.util.Optional<org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource> getType​(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource r)
      Gives the corresponding RDF ontology class type of the RDF node in the Apache Jena RDF model.
      Parameters:
      r - An RDF recource in a Apache Jena RDF store.
      Returns:
      The ontology class Resource node as an optional, that is, if exists. An empty return is given, if the triples does not exists at the graph.
